scripts.build:js: npx --no parcel build --no-source-maps --dist-dir dist/module src/index.mjs && shx mv dist/module/index.js dist/module/wingechr_javascript_frontend.min.js
scripts.build:css: npx --no parcel build --no-source-maps --no-content-hash --dist-dir dist/module src/index.scss && shx mv dist/module/index.css dist/module/wingechr_javascript_frontend.min.css
scripts.build-clean: shx rm -r dist || shx mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npx npm-run-all build:*
